full_summary:
===============

### Title
**SRDF Cards and Services - Tender Notice**

### Tender Details
---------------

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022878:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018845/22878
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-31
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-12T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Procurement Overview
------------------------

The Government of Canada, through Shared Services Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for SRDF cards and services. The requirement is for the supply of DELL equipment.

### Trade Agreements
------------------

This tender opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Details
-------------------

The contract will be awarded to the selected supplier on a competitive, open bidding basis.

### Service Delivery
-------------------

The services will be delivered to the end user entities located in Canada.

### Contracting Entity
----------------------

The contracting entity for this opportunity is Shared Services Canada.

### Point of Contact
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

Eleanor Cesare
eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca
Phone: 613 219-8366
Fax: 613 960-6026
Address: 180 Kent Street, 13th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1P 0P7, Canada

### Attachment
--------------

The related tender documents can be downloaded from the following link:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/8D71A385-B9F4-4D8C-BFE6-092FF0B869AD (English)
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/89C71260-25BC-444B-942F-AADA69933EB2 (French) [TO DO: The document is the same and the corrected language for the French document links after verifying that.]

The contracting entity is responsible for monitoring and maintaining the integrity of procurement processes and maintaining adequate documentation of tendering events. This notice does not bind the Government of Canada in any manner. [Not necessary]. The Goods and Services Act and its regulations apply to this procurement opportunity.\
Your written evaluation comments need to be submitted to the contracting authority within 10 business days after the posting of the award
